title: The Crystal Gambit: A Neon Heist

startNode.text: The perpetually shadowed alleys of Neo-Veridia hummed with the low thrum of automated traffic and the distant, tinny music from pleasure domes. Rain, a perpetual drizzle of synthetic moisture, coated the chrome and neon facades. You crouch on a grimy rooftop, the chill seeped into your bones despite the heat-tech under your suit. Below, the glittering spire of the Zephyr Tower pierces the smog, its apex housing the legendary Crystal Core, rumored to contain galactic schematics worth a king's ransom. Tonight, it's yours. Your comm-link crackles, 'Phoenix, status?'

choices.text: Reply: 'In position. Proceeding with ingress plan, Alpha.'
Reply: 'Waiting for a clearer signal. Low visibility.'
Go silent, assessing the guard patrols below.

nodes.text: You swing your grappling hook, a silent hiss of compressed air, and launch yourself towards a lower maintenance platform. The wind whips past you, smelling of ozone and synth-fuel. Your boots land softly on a slick metal walkway. A flicker of movement to your left – a security drone, its optical sensor glowing red.

choices.text: Attempt to scramble past before it fully registers you.
Draw your stun-pistol and disable it.

nodes.text: You remain crouched, the rain chilling your face. The signal on your comms fluctuates. You notice a loose service panel on the adjacent building's wall, partially obscured by an overflowing garbage chute. It looks like a less direct, but possibly safer, entry.

choices.text: Attempt the direct grapple to the Zephyr Tower, risking the signal.
Investigate the loose service panel.

nodes.text: You meticulously track the patrol patterns of two hover-guards and a ground drone. Their routes are predictable, but the ground drone occasionally deviates. This could be a good window, or a trap.

choices.text: Initiate immediate direct ingress, timing it with the window.
Wait for one more cycle, hoping for a larger opening.

nodes.text: You dash forward, your movements a blur. The drone swivels, its alarm siren letting out a piercing wail. Automated turrets whir to life on the Zephyr Tower's outer wall, locking onto your position. You're exposed!

choices.text: Dive for cover behind a ventilation unit, drawing your plasma cutter.
Engage the turrets directly with your sidearm.

nodes.text: Your stun-pistol hums, and a bolt of energy strikes the drone. It shudders, sparks, and then goes dark, crashing to the walkway with a metallic clang. The silence returns, save for the distant city hum. You locate a service hatch leading into the tower's ventilation system.

choices.text: Enter the ventilation system.
Look for an alternative, more direct entry point.

nodes.text: You pry open the service panel. It reveals a narrow, dark utility shaft. The air is stagnant and smells of old wiring and grease. A small, almost invisible inscription etched above the shaft entrance reads: 'ACCESS FOR AUTHORIZED PERSONNEL ONLY - LEVEL 3 CLEARANCE'.

choices.text: Enter the utility shaft, hoping it leads closer to your target.
Backtrack and try the direct grapple to the Zephyr Tower after all.

nodes.text: You wait. The next cycle, the ground drone's deviation is even wider, exposing a fleeting window. But as you prepare to move, a sudden bright spotlight flares from a previously unseen guard post on a lower level. You've been spotted!
nodes.endingMessage: Caught in the blinding light, you hear the distant klaxon of an alarm. Patrolling units converge on your position. Your stealth, and your heist, is over. Failure.

nodes.text: You dive, the whirring of the turrets replaced by the screech of plasma bolts impacting the wall where you just were. You rapidly unfold your plasma cutter, aiming it at the nearest turret's optical sensor. The heat is intense.

choices.text: Fire the plasma cutter.
Try to identify an alternative bypass for the turrets.

nodes.text: You open fire with your sidearm. The tiny energy bolts ping off the turrets' reinforced casings harmlessly. They respond with a barrage of their own. One shot scorches your arm, another hits your comm unit, shorting it out.
nodes.endingMessage: Your comms are dead, you're injured, and the turrets are unrelenting. You're trapped and outgunned. The heist is a bust. Failure.

nodes.text: You squeeze into the cramped, dark ventilation shaft. The air is stale and reverberates with distant mechanical hums. You crawl onward, the metallic dust coating your suit. After several minutes, you reach a junction. A faint glow emanates from a vent below to your left, and a cool draft from a larger shaft to your right.

choices.text: Head towards the faint glow (left).
Follow the cool draft (right).

nodes.text: You scan the Zephyr Tower's outer wall, your optical enhancers zooming in. There's a set of automated cargo doors two levels down, usually only active for large deliveries. They are currently sealed tight, but a nearby control panel might offer a manual override.

choices.text: Attempt to hack the cargo door control panel.
Reconsider and return to the ventilation system entry.

nodes.text: You drop into the utility shaft, using a narrow ladder. It's a dark, claustrophobic descent, punctuated by the groan of old pipes and the occasional scurrying of unseen vermin. After what feels like an eternity, the shaft opens into a sub-basement corridor, dimly lit by flickering emergency lights. The air here is heavy and smells of damp earth and disused machinery.

choices.text: Follow the corridor to the left, deeper into the sub-basement.
Follow the corridor to the right, towards the sound of distant humming.

nodes.text: The plasma cutter roars, a searing beam of energy lancing out. It superheats the turret's sensor array, causing it to melt and explode. The other turret, momentarily blinded by the flash, pauses its attack. You have a brief window.

choices.text: Dash for the ventilation system entry you spotted earlier.
Attempt to disable the second turret with a precision shot before it recovers.

nodes.text: You desperately check your wrist-console for potential turret override frequencies, but the system is heavily encrypted. A high-pitched targeting whine indicates the turrets are locking on again. You've run out of time.
nodes.endingMessage: The turrets rain down a deadly fusillade of plasma. You never stood a chance after being exposed. Heist failed. Failure.

nodes.text: You inch towards the luminous vent. Through the grates, you see a pristine, high-tech server room, bathed in the soft glow of data streams. Two technicians are engrossed in their work, oblivious. This could be a good entry point, but it's risky.

choices.text: Carefully pry open the vent and drop into the server room.
Reconsider and try the cooler draft path instead.

nodes.text: You follow the cool draft. The shaft widens considerably, becoming a main air conduit. The hum of powerful ventilation fans grows louder. You realize this is the direct path from the cooling systems, meaning it probably leads to the tower's core.

choices.text: Continue along the main air conduit.
Look for a smaller, less obvious side-vent.

nodes.text: You interface your neural-processor with the control panel. The security is formidable, but your custom-built ICE-breaker begins to chip away at the firewalls. A frantic countdown appears: 'Manual Override Lockout in T-minus 30 seconds!'

choices.text: Push harder, risk triggering an alarm for a faster hack.
Proceed cautiously, ensuring a clean bypass, even if it takes time.

nodes.text: The corridor leads to a series of abandoned storage rooms, filled with dusty, obsolete tech. The air is thick with the smell of decay. You hear the skittering of something in the darkness ahead. It's a dead end, with no clear path upstairs.
nodes.endingMessage: You've wandered into the forgotten depths of the tower. No way out, no target, and almost certainly no rescue. Heist failed. Failure.

nodes.text: The distant humming grows louder, resolving into the rhythmic thrum of massive energy conduits. The corridor opens into a vast, cavernous chamber, dimly lit by arcing electricity. Giant reactors pulse with green energy, illuminating a series of maintenance catwalks. Through a reinforced viewport, you glimpse the levels above, much closer to the Crystal Core.

choices.text: Look for a service elevator or stairwell within the reactor chamber.
Attempt to cross the reactor chamber via the catwalks, avoiding surveillance.

nodes.text: You unleash another precise blast. The second turret sparks violently and collapses from its mount with a loud crash. The area is clear! You quickly find the ventilation system entry point.

choices.text: Enter the ventilation system.

nodes.text: You carefully remove the vent cover. It scrapes slightly, but the technicians are still absorbed. You drop silently to the floor behind a stack of glowing server racks. The room is cool and filled with the gentle hum of processors. A door on the far side of the room is marked 'ACCESS: LEVEL 5'.

choices.text: Attempt to sneak across the server room to the Level 5 door.
Look for a console to hack and potentially disable security or unlock the door.

nodes.text: You crawl deeper into the enormous air conduit. The vibrations from the fans are intense, making communication difficult. Your progress is slow. Suddenly, a blast of frigid air engulfs you, and you hear the distinct whirring of an internal maintenance bot approaching.

choices.text: Freeze, hoping to remain undetected in the shadows.
Attempt to disable the maintenance bot as it passes.

nodes.text: You scan the metallic walls of the main conduit. After a moment, your optical enhancers spot a smaller, barely visible access vent, high up on the wall, leading to what looks like a service shaft. It's a tight squeeze.

choices.text: Attempt to access the smaller side-vent.
Reconsider and continue along the main air conduit.

nodes.text: You inject a burst of raw processing power into the hack. The firewall splinters, but a silent alarm is tripped, indicated by a blinking red light on the panel. The cargo doors groan open, but you hear distant sirens. You have seconds.

choices.text: Dash through the cargo doors into the loading bay.

nodes.text: You carefully work your way through the encryption, ensuring no trace. It takes longer than you'd hoped, and the lockout timer ticks down to 5 seconds before the doors finally slide open with a soft hiss. No alarms.

choices.text: Proceed cautiously into the loading bay.

nodes.text: You navigate the maintenance catwalks, peering into shadowy corners. You discover a heavily reinforced service elevator. Its control panel requires biometric access. This could be a breakthrough.

choices.text: Attempt to bypass the biometric lock.
Look for an alternative route upward, deeper in the chamber.

nodes.text: You begin crossing the vast chamber via the narrow, vibrating catwalks. Below, the glowing reactors cast a eerie light. Halfway across, a sudden surge in one of the reactors causes a powerful energy discharge, illuminating you clearly. A patrolling security bot on an upper level detects your movement.
nodes.endingMessage: The security bot's alarm blares, and armed guards immediately converge on the reactor chamber. You're trapped on the catwalks, exposed and vulnerable. Heist failed. Failure.

nodes.text: You move with the quiet grace of a shadow, slipping between the towering server racks. Your heart pounds. You reach the Level 5 door. It's locked, but a small keypad is next to it.

choices.text: Attempt to guess the passcode (four digits).
Use your neural-processor to try and brute-force the keypad.

nodes.text: You locate a small, unattended maintenance console. Your neural-processor quickly interfaces. The tower's network map appears. You see the Crystal Core's location, marked 'ARCHIVE - LEVEL 100'. You also find a sub-routine that controls the Level 5 door's lock.

choices.text: Unlock the Level 5 door and proceed.
Upload a stealth virus into the network to disable CCTV on Level 100.

nodes.text: You press yourself impossibly flat against the wall of the conduit, holding your breath as the maintenance bot clanks past, its optical sensors sweeping. It passes without incident. You continue on, eventually reaching a vertical shaft leading upwards, bathed in the soft, green glow of the Core's energy signature.

choices.text: Ascend the vertical shaft, towards the Core.

nodes.text: You draw your energy disruptor and fire a precise shot at the approaching maintenance bot. It sparks, shudders, and drops from its magnetic rails, crashing to the floor of the conduit. The loud clang echoes, and an automated alert system activates, 'Unauthorized Noise Anomaly Detected! Security Tracing!'
nodes.endingMessage: The internal security system quickly triangulates your position within the conduit. You hear heavy footsteps approaching. Your path is blocked, and your escape route compromised. Heist failed. Failure.

nodes.text: You struggle, but manage to squeeze into the tight, auxiliary service shaft. It's even more cramped than the earlier utility shaft. You crawl for what feels like an hour, hearing voices through thin walls above. Eventually, you can see light. You are in a small, rarely-used storage room on Level 72.

choices.text: Exit the storage room and try to blend in.

nodes.text: You burst through the cargo doors into a bustling loading bay. Automated forklifts whir past, and cargo drones descend. Several security guards turn, startled, and immediately raise their weapons. The sirens wail closer.
nodes.endingMessage: You're caught in the open, outmaneuvered and outgunned. The Zephyr Tower's security forces overpower you. Heist failed. Failure.

nodes.text: You step silently into the loading bay. It's a hive of automated activity. You blend seamlessly with the shadow of a colossal cargo lifter, moving towards a maintenance access door marked 'Authorized Personnel Only'. No alarms, no immediate threats.

choices.text: Attempt to open the maintenance access door.

nodes.text: You retrieve your biometric scanner from your kit. It's a tricky bypass, designed to mimic biological signatures. You press it against the scanner plate. After a tense few seconds, a faint click is heard, and the elevator doors slide open. Success!

choices.text: Enter the service elevator.

nodes.text: You venture further into the reactor chamber, seeking an alternative route. You find another series of catwalks that appear to lead directly into the central core, but they're incredibly unstable, swaying precariously over the arcing energy.

choices.text: Attempt to cross the unstable catwalks.
Return to the biometric elevator and try to find a bypass for it.

nodes.text: You input 0-c-1-d, a common sequential code for this era. A red 'ACCESS DENIED' flashes. The keypad beeps loudly, and a holographic security camera silently descends from the ceiling, its red eye fixing on you. You've been detected!
nodes.endingMessage: The alarm blares, filling the server room. Guards are on their way. You're trapped. Heist failed. Failure.

nodes.text: You connect your neural-processor. The bruteforce algorithm begins to cycle through possible codes. It's slow but methodical. After a tense minute, the door clicks open with a soft chime. You slip through, unnoticed by the technicians.

choices.text: Proceed through the Level 5 door.

nodes.text: You step through the door into a pristine, white-walled corridor. The air is filtered and hushed. 'Welcome, Level 5 Personnel,' a synthetic voice chirps. This part of the tower feels more secure. Access to higher levels is clearly marked.

choices.text: Look for a data terminal to gather more information.
Proceed directly towards the 'Core Access' signs.

nodes.text: Your stealth virus propagates through the network. A confirmation blinks on your wrist-console: 'CCTV offline - Level 100.' This gives you a critical advantage for the final stage. You then unlock the Level 5 door and proceed.

choices.text: Proceed through the Level 5 door.

nodes.text: You begin your ascent, using magnetic climbing gloves. The shaft is narrow, but surprisingly clean. As you climb, the green glow intensifies. The hum of the Core becomes a low thrum against your bones. You emerge onto a maintenance platform, directly beneath the Crystal Core chamber. A single, heavily armed guard stands between you and your target.

choices.text: Attempt a silent takedown of the guard.
Engage the guard directly.

nodes.text: You emerge from the service shaft into a sterile, quiet office space. A few employees are in their cubicles, staring blankly at glowing displays. You try to look like you belong, quickly navigating the cubicles. You spot a set of elevators marked 'EXECUTIVE LEVELS'.

choices.text: Attempt to access the executive elevators.

nodes.text: The maintenance access door is secured by an old-fashioned punch card reader. Odd, for a futuristic tower. You remember a similar system from an old data archive. A small slot for a coded card. You don't have one.

choices.text: Scan the area for a discarded access card.
Attempt to force open the door mechanically.

nodes.text: The service elevator glides upward, silent and swift. The display panel shows you ascending rapidly through dozens of floors. Soon, it announces 'Arriving Level 98 - Restricted Access'. The doors open onto a short, brightly lit corridor leading to a heavily fortified blast door.

choices.text: Attempt to breach the blast door.

nodes.text: You step onto the unstable catwalks. They groan under your weight, swaying alarmingly. The energy surges below make them even more treacherous. Suddenly, a section gives way with a metallic shriek! You barely manage to grab onto a support beam.
nodes.endingMessage: Hanging precariously over the arcing reactor, the support beam groans. There's no way to pull yourself up, and no one to hear your cries. You fall into the pulsing energy below. Heist Failed. Failure.

nodes.text: You find an abandoned data terminal. Plugging in your neural-processor, you quickly access the Zephyr Tower's internal schematics. You pinpoint the Crystal Core's exact location, Level 100, within the heavily guarded 'Sanctum'. More importantly, you find a rarely-used maintenance shaft ascending straight to Level 99.

choices.text: Head for the maintenance shaft to Level 99.
Proceed along designated 'Core Access' routes.

nodes.text: You follow the pristine signs. They lead you to a grand, gleaming atrium with multiple turbolifts. A holographic receptionist greets you. 'Welcome. For Core Access, please present Level 100 clearance.' The turbolifts are guarded by two heavily armed security personnel.

choices.text: Attempt to bluff your way past the guards.
Look for an alternative route around the atrium.

nodes.text: You activate your cloaking field, becoming almost invisible to the naked eye. You silently approach the guard from behind. A quick, practiced strike to the neck, and he slumps to the ground, unconscious. The path to the Core is clear.

choices.text: Approach the Crystal Core.

nodes.text: You step out, stun-pistol raised. The guard reacts instantly, his plasma rifle spitting blue energy. You dive, returning fire. The small chamber reverberates with the sounds of battle. You manage to stun him, but not before he triggers a silent proximity alarm.
nodes.endingMessage: The alarm blares, warning security of your presence. You hear heavy footsteps converging on your position. The Core might be within reach, but you're now surrounded. Heist Failed. Failure.

nodes.text: You press the 'Executive Levels' button. The elevator car hums to life, ascending quickly. You pass by opulent office suites. The elevator stops at Level 95, 'Executive Headquarters'. The doors open onto a lavish, empty reception area. A single security screen shows cameras covering the main turbolift in the atrium.

choices.text: Look for an internal stairwell or service shaft from here.
Try to access the building's maintenance network from a terminal.

nodes.text: You comb through the grimy corners of the loading bay. Under a stack of depleted power cells, you find a discarded, heavily worn punch card. It seems ancient. You slide it into the reader. The door clicks open, revealing a dusty, disused service elevator.

choices.text: Enter the service elevator.

nodes.text: You draw your plasma cutter and begin to melt through the locking mechanism. The smell of burning metal fills the air, and the process is slow and noisy. A security bot rounds the corner of the loading bay, alerted by the sound.
nodes.endingMessage: The security bot fires, and its alarm blares. You're pinned down, and the door is still fused. You've drawn too much attention. Heist Failed. Failure.

nodes.text: The blast door is a formidable obstacle. You deploy your thermal charges, placing them strategically. The charges ignite with a silent, searing heat. The door's thick plating glows red-hot, and then, with a deafening groan, it explodes inward, revealing a short passage leading directly to the Crystal Core chamber. The explosion will have alerted everyone.

choices.text: Charge into the Crystal Core chamber.

nodes.text: You locate the maintenance shaft. It's dusty and rarely used, a cramped ascent that twists and turns. After what feels like an hour, you feel a cool draft from above. You emerge into a service area on Level 99, directly below the Core. You hear the faint hum of energy and distant conversations.

choices.text: Cautiously approach the Core Chamber from Level 99.

nodes.text: You stride forward, projecting an air of confidence. 'Clearance Alpha-Delta-Gamma-7,' you state, your voice modulated to sound authoritative. 'Director's urgent request, Level 100.' One guard narrows his eyes. 'Sir, I don't show that code in the database. Please present your ID.'
nodes.endingMessage: The guard reaches for his stunner. Your bluff has failed. The other guard raises his rifle. You're surrounded in a high-traffic area. Heist failed. Failure.

nodes.text: You discreetly move away from the main atrium. You discover a hidden, narrow service corridor behind a holographic display. It's dark and smells faintly of recycled air. This could lead to a less obvious path to the higher levels.

choices.text: Enter the service corridor.

nodes.text: You enter the Crystal Core Chamber. It's a vast, circular room, bathed in the ethereal green glow of the Crystal Core, suspended in the center by shimmering energy fields. No immediate guards. The air crackles with latent power. This is it.

choices.text: Approach the Crystal Core to initiate the data extraction.

nodes.text: You search the executive area. Behind a hidden panel disguised as a modern art piece, you find a rarely used, narrow maintenance stairwell. It spirals upwards, dusty and silent. It seems to lead to unseen levels above.

choices.text: Ascend the maintenance stairwell.

nodes.text: You find an executive terminal. Hacking it gives you deep access to the tower's systems. You quickly override the security on the turbolifts in the atrium, giving yourself a temporary Level 100 clearance. You also reroute two patrol drones to distant floors as a diversion.

choices.text: Descend to the atrium and use the turbolifts.

nodes.text: The old service elevator creaks and groans as you nudge it upwards. It's painfully slow, but it feels off-grid. The ascent is long and monotonous. Finally, it grinds to a halt at a rarely-used loading dock on Level 85. The bay door leads directly to an exterior skywalk.

choices.text: Exit onto the exterior skywalk.

nodes.text: You burst into the Crystal Core Chamber, your pulse pounding. Two elite guards are already drawing their weapons, alerted by the blast. Behind them, the Crystal Core shimmers tantalizingly.

choices.text: Engage the guards immediately, fighting your way to the Core.

nodes.text: You cautiously approach the Core Chamber from Level 99. A small, often-overlooked ventilation shaft leads up into the ceiling of the main Core access corridor above. It's too small for a guard, but perfect for you.

choices.text: Enter the ventilation shaft and emerge into the corridor above.

nodes.text: The service corridor is dim and narrow, winding through forgotten utility spaces. After several twists and turns, it seems to be leading upwards, past various maintenance junctions. You occasionally hear the whir of distant machinery.

choices.text: Continue along the service corridor, pressing upwards.

nodes.text: You reach the gleaming pedestal supporting the Crystal Core. It pulses with stored information. You connect your data-spike. The transfer begins, a silent, rapid stream. Your comms buzz. 'Phoenix, data transfer confirmed! Get out of there! Alarms are going wild on lower levels!'

choices.text: Initiate immediate extraction and escape.

nodes.text: You ascend the dusty, silent stairwell. It is seemingly endless. After a long climb, the air becomes fresher, and the stairs lead to a small, unmarked door. It opens into a narrow, empty corridor on Level 99, a short distance from the Core's service entrance.

choices.text: Proceed along the corridor to the Core's service entrance.

nodes.text: You return to the atrium. Your confident stride is met with recognition by the holographic receptionist. 'Level 100 clearance confirmed. Welcome, Director.' The guards nod respectfully as you step into the turbolift. The ride is swift and direct, taking you to Level 100, the Core Access floor.

choices.text: Step out onto Level 100, preparing for the final approach.

nodes.text: You step out onto the exterior skywalk. Wind whips around you, and below, the city sprawls in a dazzling, chaotic panorama of neon. The skywalk curves around the tower, offering a perilous but direct path upwards. You spot a high-level maintenance access hatch on the main tower wall, several hundred meters above.

choices.text: Begin a risky climb up the exterior wall.

nodes.text: You engage the elite guards. Their training is exceptional, but your agility gives you an edge. You disarm one, sending his rifle clattering, and stun the other with a swift kick. But the struggle was loud. Alarms blare, lights flash, and you hear the thud of heavy boots approaching.

choices.text: Quickly extract the data from the Core, then attempt to escape via the emergency exit.

nodes.text: You emerge from the vent into a pristine, high-security corridor on Level 100. The Crystal Core Chamber entrance is just ahead. Thanks to your prior CCTV hack, no cameras are watching this specific section. The corridor is empty.

choices.text: Proceed directly into the Crystal Core Chamber.

nodes.text: You continue your quiet ascent through the service corridor. It finally opens into a secure back section of Level 90, the administrative floor. No one is around. From here, you see a heavily fortified security elevator, marked 'Core Access'.

choices.text: Attempt to bypass the security elevator's controls.

nodes.text: Data in hand, you activate a pre-planted miniature grav-chute. It propels you silently upwards to a hidden rooftop extraction point. Your getaway vehicle, a sleek black speeder, materializes from the city haze. You leap aboard just as the first security drones appear, their lights flashing impotently far below. The Crystal Core's secrets are now yours, and the 'Phoenix' flies free.
nodes.endingMessage: SUCCESS! The Crystal Gambit was a flawless victory. You extracted the data, evaded capture, and your reputation as the galaxy's most elusive phantom thief is solidified. The whispers of the Phoenix will echo through the neon-drenched streets for years to come.

nodes.text: You step onto Level 100. The air here feels charged with energy. The architecture is sleek, minimalist, designed for functionality. A single, massive blast door dominates the far end of the corridor, emblazoned with the Zephyr Tower's insignia and 'THE SANCTUM: CRYSTAL CORE'. Two elite security guards stand vigilant before it.

choices.text: Attempt to incapacitate both guards simultaneously.
Look for a hidden security bypass nearby.

nodes.text: You activate your magnetic boots and begin the arduous climb up the Zephyr Tower's slick, curved exterior. The wind howls, threatening to tear you from the facade. Every meter is a struggle. You hear the distant whirring of patrol drones. You need to be fast.

choices.text: Continue the rapid, risky ascent.

nodes.text: You frantically initiate the data transfer. The Core pulses wildly as the information streams into your device. Simultaneously, you trigger the emergency floor panel next to the Core, revealing a narrow, emergency escape chute. Security is seconds away.

choices.text: Drop down the emergency escape chute, data in hand.

nodes.text: You apply your bypass module to the high-security elevator panel. The system is state-of-the-art, and it fights back. A silent alarm triggers, indicated by a subtle red flash on the panel you're working on. You still have a chance, but time is critical.

choices.text: Push the bypass module to full power, risking system overload but gaining immediate access.
Attempt a slower, cleaner bypass to avoid further alarms, but losing time.

nodes.text: You deploy two silent, high-frequency sonic disruptors. The elite guards, caught off guard, collapse to the ground, their neural pathways temporarily overloaded. You have a few precious moments before they recover. The blast door to the Sanctum stands open. No alarms triggered yet.

choices.text: Enter the Sanctum chamber and access the Crystal Core.

nodes.text: You scan the pristine walls of Level 100. Your optical enhancers detect a barely perceptible seam in the floor near a decorative plinth. It might be a hidden access panel for technicians. You activate a micro-scanner.

choices.text: Attempt to open the hidden access panel.

nodes.text: You push on, muscles burning. The wind is a fury, and your magnetic boots struggle for purchase. A patrol drone descends rapidly, its spotlight sweeping the wall. Its optical sensors lock onto you. 'Unauthorized presence detected! Engage!'
nodes.endingMessage: The drone opens fire, its energy bolts impacting inches from your head. You're exposed on the side of the tower, nowhere to go. You fall. Heist Failed. Failure.

nodes.text: You slide down the dark, twisting emergency chute. It's rough, but rapid. You emerge moments later into a lower, sub-level access tunnel. Your team leader's voice crackles, 'Phoenix, you're hot! We have a vehicle awaiting by the old industrial canals. Move!'

choices.text: Sprint for the extraction vehicle.

nodes.text: The elevator shudders violently, sparks fly, and the door groans open. The silent alarm blazes red, but you're through. You step into the security elevator, slamming the override button for 'Deep Core Access'. The ascent is quick, cutting through the final levels. You arrive at the Crystal Core's personal guard chamber. Two guards are facing away, unaware.

choices.text: Perform a rapid double takedown.

nodes.text: You meticulously work on the bypass, avoiding all alarm triggers. The silence is unnerving. Just as the bar reaches 90%, you hear distant voices. 'Security anomaly reported on Level 90. Investigate.' The elevator remains locked. You're trapped.
nodes.endingMessage: The security team closes in. You're caught in a high-security area, with no way to progress, and nowhere to run. Heist Failed. Failure.

nodes.text: You hurry into the gleaming Crystal Core chamber. The massive, shimmering artifact pulses with an inner light, radiating power. No other guards are present, thanks to your swift action. This is your moment.

choices.text: Access the Crystal Core and initiate data extraction.

nodes.text: The micro-scanner confirms a hidden access panel. You press a precise sequence on the plinth, and a section of the floor slides open silently, revealing a narrow, descending maintenance tunnel. It's dusty but appears rarely used.

choices.text: Descend into the maintenance tunnel.

nodes.text: You sprint through the grimy tunnels, the sound of klaxons slowly fading behind you. Ahead, a blinding light and the hum of an engine. Your team's hovercraft is waiting, engines idling. You leap in, and it streaks into the night sky, leaving the Zephyr Tower and its secrets far behind. Data secure, mission complete.
nodes.endingMessage: SUCCESS! Despite the chaos, you pulled off the heist. The Crystal Core's data is yours, and you escaped into the night, another legendary exploit added to your name. The Phoenix lives to steal another day!

nodes.text: With the element of surprise, you execute a flawless double takedown. Both guards are down before they know what hit them. The room is silent once more. Before you stands the Crystal Core, shimmering within its containment field.

choices.text: Initiate data extraction from the Crystal Core.

nodes.text: You slide into the narrow maintenance tunnel. It's a tight squeeze, leading downwards, then subtly curving around the tower's central structural supports. After a quiet descent, it opens directly into a small, rarely-used storage space adjacent to the Crystal Core's outer security perimeter. You hear the faint hum of the Core from beyond the wall.

choices.text: Scan the wall for weaknesses or an access panel to the Core chamber.

nodes.text: Your scanner reveals a hidden, almost invisible emergency access hatch, blending perfectly with the wall. It requires a specific frequency to activate. You input the override frequency you 'acquired' earlier from a data broker. The hatch slides open silently.

choices.text: Step into the Crystal Core Chamber.
